title: gati nIyE
sahitya:
gati nIyE nAyEn un aDimai aiyA ennaik-kai tUkki ALvadun kaDamai aiyA endan


anupallavi

  nadiyil shiranda diyva nadiyAm kAviri iraNDin
naDuvil tiru arangap-paDi vAzh nAraNA endan


caraNam    koDumai garbhavAsamum jananamE mighak-koDumai nALai varum maraNa bhayamE-iDaiyil iDikaraiyin vAzhvO bhayankaramE edarkenranji azhuvEn arangA manamirangAi
